程序包 daiwei.tojava.taskmanager

类 Storage

  • java.lang.Object
    • daiwei.tojava.taskmanager.Storage
  • public class Storage
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is to create load task from file Path and save task in file Path function.
    从以下版本开始:
    TaskManager lvl5
    版本:
    2018.11.02
    作者:
    David

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      Storage​(java.lang.String filePath)
      This constructs s TaskManager with string filepath

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLines​(java.lang.String filePath)
      This function is to read task from storage file line by line.
      java.util.List<Task> load()
      This function is to load tasks from storage file.
      static void save​(java.util.List<Task> tasks)
      This function is to save tasks in storage file.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Storage

        public Storage​(java.lang.String filePath)
        This constructs s TaskManager with string filepath
        参数:
        filePath - task storage file path

    • 方法详细资料

      • save

        public static void save​(java.util.List<Task> tasks)
        This function is to save tasks in storage file.
        参数:
        tasks - tasks

      • getLines

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLines​(java.lang.String filePath)
        This function is to read task from storage file line by line.
        参数:
        filePath - tasks'storage filepath
        返回:
        tasks line by line

      • load

        public java.util.List<Task> load()
                          throws TaskManagerException
        This function is to load tasks from storage file.
        返回:
        loaded tasks
        抛出:
        TaskManagerException - if problem reading file can throw this exception.
